title: How to build/play blitzcrank?
body:
So i am fairly new and have decided that i like to play blitzcrank ( just not the best at him) and am currently building him ice born gauntlet followed by the frozen heart then i don't know what to buy, im wondering is this the best way to build him and/ or if i should buy different items. in general all your blitzcrank tips and tricks would be greatly appreciated

-mygoathasfeet

replies.body:
Hey there mygoathasfeet,

My current go to build for Blitzcrank is as follows:

Item 1. Gold income item. Ancient Coin or Face of the Mountain
Item 2. Boots: Mobility Boots (Blue Enhancement), or Ninja Tabi (Green Enhancement), or Mercury's Treads (Green Enhancement). 
Item 3. Sightstone 
Item 4. Mikael's Crucible 
Item 5. Frozen Heart
Item 6. Randuins

But I also run a wide variety of different builds on Blitzcrank.
The best way to build Blitzcrank or any support and just any champion in the game is to build situationally. No point building a Spirit Visage if the enemy has no Ability Power. 

Note: I see the potential with Iceborn Gauntlet but I personally think it's a waste of a good item.

build him like thresh, but with mana.
play him like thresh.

Feral flare - sorc shoes once ur lv 6, sunfire, triforce...

This is jg.

try looking at some guides off here
http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/blitzcrank-guide

If you're bad at pulling enemy champions, try building move speed and cdr early to ensure your in range.
There's no perfect way to building items as it is situational on your team's champions and the enemies'.
If your team doesn't have good engage, try going for {{item:3069}} or {{item:3800}} or {{item:3056}} .
If the enemy has high mobility, then {{item:3025}} and {{item:3143}} are great when you engage, so you can slow them down.
In many cases, I reckon {{item:3143}}  is better than {{item:3110}}  for its pure HP rather than relying on your passive.
{{item:3222}}  is good when enemy team has a lot of cc.
Try not to pull their engagers/tanks ofc ;)

Usually blitz goes support with an adc
depends what role you are playing him. Support? Mid? Top? Jungle?

"ice born gauntlet followed by the frozen heart then i don't know what to buy, "
There is your problem. Those are both excellent items for Blitzcrank. However, it sounds like you are rushing those two items no matter what the team comp is. Early armour is always good for a tank support, don't get me wrong, but don't rush too much of it it they are full of magic damage.
Apart from that though, you are playing support Blitz. If you are playing him as a tank, just tank up. They have lots of magic damage? Get some MR. What you build as a tank is always gonna depend on the enemy team comp, so you shouldn't have a totally set build path.
Also, Sightstone early. Boots are something you have choice with too. Mobi boots are great for getting in position to land hooks, of course. Some people go for Lucidity boots (why not). Your other main choice is Ninja Tabi or Merc Treads. Even if they somehow have no magic damage though, Merc Treads help so much against any CC.

Start the game.
Put a point in Q.
Miss 20.
Hit 1, win game.
